song.title: Convalescence
song.info:
"Convalescence" - Pop/Ambient - 8:33
This was my debut track for my netlabel hellven. Written and produced in 2 days, this is the first track of mine featuring singing. I wish the vocals were produced better but unfortunately I was facing hardware problems at the time! This track was warmly received by our listeners though, and I'm satisfied with it, even though it's much more "Pop" oriented than what I would normally do.
